findings: Response remains strictly on-label and does not endorse off-label use.
Requests clarification on prior therapies and patient status, which are necessary stratifiers.

rationale: The response adheres to label boundaries, requests essential clinical details, and avoids any off-label or promotional content. It could be slightly more specific about label caveats, but overall meets all compliance and safety criteria.
